text: Maritime is an American indie pop band formed in 2003. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Glass Floor (2004) * We, the Vehicles (2005) * Heresy and the Hotel Choir (2007) * Human Hearts (2011) * Magnetic Bodies/Maps of Bones (2015) ==References== Category:American rock bands Category:Indie bands Category:Indie rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 2003 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2017
title: Maritime
